name: hail2u.net
description: I write what I learned & what is possible on the WWW from Japan.
author: Kyo Nagashima <hail2u@gmail.com> (https://kyonagashima.com/)

scripts.css: scss --precision 3 --sourcemap=none --unix-newlines --update src/css/:tmp/ && node bin/postcss.js && cp -aux tmp/* dist/styles/ && node bin/styleguide.js
scripts.deploy: cd dist/ && git commit --all --message="Build" && git push origin gh-pages
scripts.img: node bin/rasterize.js && convert tmp/favicon-256.png tmp/favicon-64.png tmp/favicon-32.png tmp/favicon-16.png dist/favicon.ico && cp -aux src/img/* dist/images/
scripts.js: cp src/js/*.js tmp/ && node bin/uglifyjs.js && cp -aux tmp/* dist/scripts/ && cp -aux node_modules/unutm/build/unutm.* dist/scripts/
scripts.postarticles: node bin/generate.js --blog && node bin/feedmix.js && node bin/sitemap.js
scripts.postblog: git add -- src/weblog/plugins/state/ && git commit --message="Update cache files"
scripts.posthtml: node bin/feedmix.js && node bin/sitemap.js && npm run deploy
scripts.static: cp src/.nojekyll src/CNAME src/humans.txt src/robots.txt dist/
